pr_title: Support outbound ports in Hazelcast config

timeline.message: Support outbount ports in Hazelcast config

timeline.bodyText:
Outbound.
Also, please document the property to explain meaning and intention both here, and possibly in the docs. (Though in the docs, you can just reference the setting; Javadoc is fine)
timeline.author: mmoayyed

timeline.bodyText: Assign to an empty array list.
timeline.author: mmoayyed

timeline.bodyText: Conditional should unnecessary with an empty list above.
timeline.author: mmoayyed

timeline.bodyText: I suspect you can also use a lambda syntax here instead of the for-loop.
timeline.author: mmoayyed
